file_insights.changes: Added re-export of validateOrigin and requiresOriginValidation from origin-validation.ts

patterns_discovered: Barrel export pattern for authentication-related modules
gotchas_discovered: Ensuring origin validation can be used independently by route handlers

approach_outcome.description: Updated index.ts to expose origin validation functions for broader use

recommendations: Maintain consistent re-export patterns across authentication modules
Document the purpose of independently exported validation functions
Consider adding type exports for validation functions
